name: Swipe Wrong
description:
An Online Dating Simulator

Make a dating profile using random words and phrases pulled from actual dating profiles. Will it be charming? Will it even be comprehensible? Share your finished creation with your friends!

Programmed by: Nigel

Art & Design by: Hannah

Written by: Nigel & Hannah

Music by: Ian Danger Liddell

~Special Thanks to OKCupid for their sweet public database~
